original_text: Whatever is happening now has happened before. Everything that will happen in the future has already happened. God causes the same things to happen again and again. 3: God is the one who decides the right time for things to happen on the earth. We need to understand that he rules over all things. It is important to understand that God has a reason for all the things that he does. We will never understand everything that God does but we can enjoy our lives if we respect his authority. Are people like animals? Whatever is happening now has happened before.
korean_text: 이제 있는 것이 옛적에 있었고 장래에 있을 것도 옛적에 있었나니 하나님은 이미 지난 것을 다시 찾으시느니라

sentences.original_text: Whatever is happening now has happened before.
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 일어나는 모든 일은 이미 일어났던 일이다.

sentences.original_text: Everything that will happen in the future has already happened.
sentences.korean_translation: 미래에 일어날 모든 것은 이미 일어났다.

sentences.original_text: God causes the same things to happen again and again.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 같은 일들이 반복해서 일어나게 하신다.

sentences.original_text: 3: God is the one who decides the right time for things to happen on the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 땅에서 일들이 일어날 적절한 때를 결정하시는 분이다.

sentences.original_text: We need to understand that he rules over all things.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그분이 모든 것을 다스리신다는 것을 이해해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: It is important to understand that God has a reason for all the things that he does.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 하시는 모든 일에는 이유가 있다는 것을 이해하는 것이 중요하다.

sentences.original_text: We will never understand everything that God does
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님이 하시는 모든 것을 결코 이해할 수 없지만

sentences.original_text: but we can enjoy our lives if we respect his authority.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분의 권위를 존중한다면 우리는 삶을 즐길 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: Whatever is happening now has happened before.
sentences.korean_translation: 지금 일어나는 모든 일은 이미 일어났던 일이다.
